mapper.select: SELECT o.order_id as orderId, TO_CHAR(order_date, 'yy-mm-dd') as orderDate, total_price as totalPrice, reserve_type as reserveType, visit_date as visitDate, food_id as firstFoodId, res_id as resId, card_name as cardName FROM ORDERINFO o JOIN FOOD_ORDER f ON o.order_id = f.order_id WHERE o.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY orderDate DESC, visitDate DESC
